#–ø—É–Ω–∫@spbu_advert 
#–ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–º@spbu_advert

‚ÄúMelting pot‚Äù: master class on cross-cultural communications

üóì November 16, Thursday, 16:30-18:00.
üìçMaster class, offline, in English, Volkhovskiy Lane, 3.

An American, a Chinese and a Russian come to the office‚Ä¶ No, this is not the beginning of a joke, but an ordinary day in an international corporation. Are you going to work in such a company? Good knowledge of the language is cool, but sometimes no language certificate will help you to get on with a person from a different culture. To avoid getting into trouble while communicating with foreigners, come to the master-class on cross-cultural communications! 

Questions to be discussed:
‚Äî Why is cross-cultural communication vital in business?
‚Äî What are the main differences in the business cultures of Russia, China, India and Iran?
‚Äî How to build communication with colleagues in a cross-cultural environment?
‚Äî How to resolve conflicts in a cross-cultural environment?

‚ù§ Especially relevant for International Management and Master's programs and anyone who is interested!

‚û° List of speakers:
Elena Orlova ‚Äî Head of Foreign Languages for Business and Management department, SPbU
Vadim Klimachev ‚Äî Head of International Cooperation, Gazprom Corporate Institute

üì£ To register for the Master Class follow the link: t.me/gsoMCW_bot. MCW GUIDE will help you register for this and other events of the week, as well as remind you of the planned events that you have chosen.

üá∑üá∫ü§ùüá¨üá≤ On November 04, 2023, within the framework of the National Unity Day, a Russian delegation visited "Brufut Upper and Senior Secondary School". 

üá∑üá∫ At the invitation of the Gambian side, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Russian Federation H.E.Mr. Dmitry KURAKOV gave a welcoming speech and took part in a solemn ceremony of tree planting on the territory of the school. 

During the visit, a representative of the St Petersburg State University (SPbU) Svetlana Bolotseva, held a cultural master class for over 150 students of the school and told about the opportunities of studying at SPbU. 

üá∑üá∫üá¨üá≤ The solemn part of the event ended with the signing of a cooperation agreement between "Brufut Upper and Senior Secondary School" and "MIR School" (Dobrograd, Vladimir region of the Russian Federation).

#RussiaAfrica #RussiaGambia #Gambia

üá∑üá∫ü§ùüá¨üá≤ Le 4 novembre 2023, dans le cadre de la Journ√©e de l'unit√© nationale, une d√©l√©gation russe a visit√© "l'√©cole secondaire et sup√©rieure de Brufut" en R√©publique de Gambie. 

üá∑üá∫ A l'invitation de la Partie gambienne, l'Ambassadeur Extraordinaire et Pl√©nipotentiaire de la F√©d√©ration de Russie S.E.M. Dmitry KURAKOV a visit√© l'√©v√©nement o√π il a prononc√© un discours de bienvenue et a particip√© √† une c√©r√©monie solennelle de plantation d'arbres sur le territoire de l'√©cole. 

Au cours de la visite, une repr√©sentante de l'Universit√© d'√âtat de Saint-P√©tersbourg (SPbU), Svetlana Bolotseva, a donn√© une classe de ma√Ætre culturelle √† plus de 150 √©tudiants de l'√©cole et a parl√© des possibilit√©s d'√©tudier √† la SPbU. 

üá∑üá∫üá¨üá≤ La partie solennelle de l'√©v√©nement s'est termin√©e par la signature d'un accord de coop√©ration entre l'√©cole "Brufut" et l'√©cole "MIR" (Dobrograd, r√©gion de Vladimir de la F√©d√©ration de Russie).
